page.title: Instructors
page.content:
We have instructors available at  $25 an hour.

We offer a 4-hour on the water course based on Chapters 9 to 14 of this book. Students are expected to read Chapters 1 to 8 and Chapter 15 prior to class. You may borrow a book from us or buy it online.

Chapter 9 - Getting Underway

Chapter 10 - Putting It All Together: Your First Sail

Chapter 11 - Tacking

Chapter 12 - Upwind sailing

Chapter 13 - Downwind Sailing And Jibing

Chapter 14 - Returning & Shipshape
